column1: Train to be an international business managerExplore global economics, strategic management and accounting and financeThis MSc International Business and Finance degree will give you a broad practical knowledge of business administration and finance in the global business context.You will explore the essential knowledge and skills you need as an international business manager, and study strategy and research modules alongside specialist finance topics. You will complete an independent research project in your final term.
FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
